transcript:
Customer: Aarti mam good morning.
Executive: Haan good morning boliye. 
Customer: Ji mam kaise ho aap?
Executive: Haan theek hai. 
Customer: Aarti mam kal aapse jo baat hui thi aapne wo catalog pe kaam kiya hai kal?
Executive: Nahi mai abhi kar de rahi hu kyuki us time pe thoda problem ho raha tha isliye mai. 
Customer: Achha mai ye keh raha hu Suresh ji hai abhi aap Suresh sir. 
Executive: Suresh ji sun rahe hai boliye. 
Customer: Haan baat kar dijiye meri ek baar 7279.
Customer: 279.
Customer: Ek second sir ha wo thoda kaam kar rahe hai. 
Customer: Achha mai ye mai ye keh raha hu Suresh sir ne na abhi IndiaMART ke helpline number pe call kiya tha. 
Executive: Ji haan. 
Customer: Haan unhone call ye kiya tha ki jo OTP nahi aa raha tha. 
Customer: Wo bahut der se koshish kar rahe the hum log OTP nahi aa raha tha. 
Customer: To OTP mam is number pe nahi jayega na mam kal aapko bataya tha OTP aapke number pe jayega na 82 wale pe jayega na. 
Customer: Ispe bhi nahi aa raha tha. 
Customer: Achha abhi ja raha hai OTP mam. 
Customer: Ha abhi just aaya hai to wo open kiye. 
Customer: Achha mujhe aisa laga tha I think sir ne isliye call kiya hai ki 62 wale pe OTP nahi ja raha hai. 
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan bol rahe hai wo jo number hum add kiya tha phone direct call jab jayega to hum logo ke paas nahi aayega sir. 
Customer: Direct call aapka number mai dekha to PNS number pe aapka number add hai ki nahi hai PNS number pe aapka add number nahi hai bahut abhi karwa de raha hu mam ek baar mam ko call dijiyega sir. 
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. 
Executive: Haan haan sir mai ye keh raha hu PNS number pe aapka number add nahi hai 62 wala mai abhi mam ko bol ke ye number aapka add karwa de raha hu. 
Customer: Achha theek hai mera number add kar do. 
Executive: Haan haan mam Aarti mam. 
Customer: Dusra number tumhara karo jo prime wala OTP lagta hai na wo wala number mera de do. 
Executive: Alternate number tumhara rakh do theek hai maine ye samjhaya tha sir. 
Customer: Haan sir haan hello. 
Executive: Haan ji. 
Customer: Prime wala jo number hai haan haan haan alternate wala jo number hai na wo mera number add kar dijiye theek hai. 
Executive: Matlab mai ye keh raha hu matlab primary number ye aapka rakhu aur alternate number jo hai wo mam ka rakhu right. 
Customer: Haan haan haan. 
Executive: Aur Ramesh ji aur Ramesh ji ka number wo wo remove karwa du na. 
Customer: Haan haan wo remove kar dijiye. 
Executive: Theek hai ek minute ruko to mai ek baar video call pe leke mam ko le leta hu aur taki unko thoda guide kar dena kaise number edit hoga. 
Customer: Theek hai kar do. 
Executive: Theek hai hello Aarti mam. 
Customer: Haan boliye sir. 
Executive: Mai ye keh raha hu aap number edit kar loge ya fir mai aapko guide kar du waise number to aap edit kar lete ho aap. 
Customer: Edit kar to lete hai but mera system thoda problem kar raha hai. 
Executive: Okay matlab mai aapko thoda samjha de raha hu sir kya chah rahe hai. 
Executive: Sir ye chah rahe hai mam jo abhi aapne primary number na apna dal rakha hai right. 
Customer: Ji haan. 
Executive: Haan sir ye keh rahe hai ki jo wo number remove karke waha par kya karo aap sir ka number dal do theek hai. 
Customer: Mere system me thoda problem ho raha hai theek hai network issue ho raha hai to waha pe abhi kar nahi pa rahi hu isko kuch. 
Executive: Koi baat nahi aap jaise aap kar pa rahe hai to sir aap kar dijiye thoda. 
Executive: Nahi nahi wo number change nahi hoga mam number aap hi change kar paoge mam actually kya hai na OTP jata hai mam uspe wo aapke side se ho payega hamare paas access nahi hai mam uska. 
Customer: Achha theek hai aap mujhe bataiye mai karti hu. 
Executive: Haan haan. 
Executive: Abhi system chal raha hai aapka sahi. 
Customer: Thoda problem ho raha hai boliye mai dekh rahi hu koshish kar rahi hu us pe karne ka. 
Executive: Haan aapne mai keh raha hu aapne number kal change to kiya tha aapne same aise hi change hoga jaise aapne change kiya tha mam. 
Customer: Kal maine change nahi sir ne hi change kiya tha khud hi. 
Executive: Sir ne change kiya tha theek hai. 
Executive: Chalo mai aapko video meet ka link bhej dunga mai aapko guide kar deta hu kaise change hoga. 
Customer: Hmm hmm theek hai. 
Executive: Haan ek minute mai bhej raha hu aap. 
Executive: Bas sir se OTP le lijiyega hai na. 
Executive: Aarti mam maine aapko wo link bhej diya video meet ka. 
Executive: Aapke mail ID pe aaya hoga. 
Customer: Mai check kar rahi hu. 
Executive: Haan. 
Executive: Fir lage haath mai aapke catalog pe bhi kaam hi kar dunga mam. 
Customer: Mera mail pe aaya hai kya?
Executive: Nahi maine aapne jo register mail ID us pe bheja hai mai aapko mail ID confirm kar deta hu. 
Executive: Suresh ki mail ID gaya Suresh Sahu038@gmail.com. 
Customer: Wo to unke paas hai aap mere matlab whatsapp pe bhej dijiye sir. 
Executive: Bhej raha hu mam. 
Executive: Aapne whatsapp wala number batana aapne ek baar mujhe. 
Customer: 933. 
Executive: 933. 
Customer: 04. 
Executive: 0487136 right mam. 
Customer: Haan. 
Executive: Ji mam maine aapko share kar diya. 
Customer: Ji vyakti songe apni kotha bolchen tini aapnar callti holde rekhechen anugraha kore line thakun.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer unable to receive OTP on registered number.

- Wants to change primary and alternate numbers.

- Customer facing system issues.



Resolution:

- Executive explained OTP process.

- Executive offered to guide via video call.

- Executive shared video meet link on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to guide customer on number editing.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- otp, number change, video meet, pns number
